definitions.definition: A framework of steel bars resting on side supports to bridge over or around something.
A supporting framework for a barrel .
A gantry crane or gantry scaffold .
A cylindrical scanner assembly in the bore of which the response of bodies or tissues to some specific exposure can be detected for 3D imaging.

main_definition: A framework of steel bars resting on side supports to bridge over or around something.
secondary_definitions: A supporting framework for a barrel .
A gantry crane or gantry scaffold .
( medical imaging ) A cylindrical scanner assembly in the bore of which the response of bodies or tissues to some specific exposure can be detected for 3D imaging.
